name: Time's Enigma
description:
A text-only fantasy adventure game for the PC involving travel to various periods throughout time. Your old professor has developed a Time Manipulator and has tricked you into using it with the instruction that you must bring back as many items from the past as possible to  show him where and when you've visited. 

Scenarios include Pompeii, Isaac Newton, Samuel Pepys, David Livingston, The Somme, The Titanic and others.

The game will run on Windows or in a DOS window. All files in the zipped folder must be present in the game folder for the game to run.
